description.en: NXD Next Token is issued on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Binance Smart Chain (BSC) is an Ethereum-compatible blockchain and offers the same smart contract functionality with lower transaction fees. The biggest merit of BSC is that though it is centralized, users can execute transactions at ultra-high speeds.
